name: High-Voltage Currant
effect: This gets +1{A} when another Berry does damage. When played: Conjure a Berry.
description: These trouble makers are just asking to get grounded.

name: Wall Nut Bowling
effect: Make a Wall-Nut in each Ground lane. Attack for 6 damage in those lanes.

name: Zombie Coach
effect: When played: All Sports Zombies can't be hurt this turn

name: Galacta-Cactus
effect: When destroyed: Do 1 damage to everything.
description: I take pity on no one. For I am Galacta-Cactus!

name: Laser Base Alpha
effect: Zombies here get Deadly and Strikethrough
description: Zombies with LASERS. What could possibly go wrong?

name: Potato Mine
effect: When destroyed: Do 2 damage to a Zombie there

name: Cactus
description: It's true. I'm prickly on the outside but spongy on the inside.

name: Goat
effect: This gets +1{A}/+1{H} when any kind of Goat is hurt
description: Hungry…Smelly…A lot like a Zombie but with 100% more goat.

name: Space Ninja
effect: While in an Environment: The first time each turn this does damage, do 1 damage to each Plant
description: You will never hear him coming in the vacuum of space.

name: Paparazzi Zombie
effect: This gets +1{A}/+1{H} when you play a Trick
description: Why is everyone always screaming and running away in his photos?

name: Zombot Aerostatic Gondola
effect: When this hurts the Plant Hero, it moves to a random lane and leaves behind a random Zombie
description: These pirates hit hard, then escape at 3 miles per hour.
